description: This hybrid course (online and in-class components) equips future leaders and change makers with the knowledge base and skills needed to succeed in the growing job market at the nexus of international development, social impact, sustainability, and policy implementation. The core components of the course are field-based action learning, team-based projects, and case assignments. These are designed to enhance empathy and collaboration, as well as develop cross-cultural competencies in select fields such as financial inclusion, small business and social enterprise development, corporate social responsibility, gender and development, education and health policy, sustainable development, and post-conflict reconstruction and governance.
title: Working with Stakeholders in International Development
